title: The Banjo Lesson
medium: drypoint and color aquatint on laid paper
provenance_text:
Albert E. McVitty (1876-1948), Princeton, NJ , until 1948 [1]; sale, "The Notable Print Collection of the Late Albert E. McVitty", Parke-Bernet Galleries, Inc., New York, NY, November 28-29, 1949, no. 215 [2]; Charles Sessler, Philadelphia, PA; purchased by Museum October 1950 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Albert Elliott McVitty, Lugt 1862c.
[2]. This lot, sold on the second evening of the sale, was bought by Sessler for the museum; it was accessioned months later, on October 11, 1950.
